channel.description: Recent content in Pages on jstvz.org

item.title: Projects
item.description: Here’s an incomplete and infrequently updated list of my projects. sfdx-auradoc A documentation generation plugin for SFDX. Currently only generates a dependency graph, but other features are on the roadmap. Github

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m a software developer in San Francisco. I specialize in Salesforce Development, but lately I’ve been working on some DevOps-y things in the same space. I’m also an intermittent Wikipedia editor, where I work on topics related to computational biology, microbiology, and African-American history. You can reach me at j at this_domain or on Twitter.
